scripts.build: npm run build:rustup && npm run build:cpwasm
scripts.build:rustup: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --workspace --exclude pdao-near-interact --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.start: npm run deploy && echo The app is starting! && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel frontend/index.html --open
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
